head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAHILL, MARGARET J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAHILL, MARGARET J.

block.p: CAHILL-Margaret J. On October 8, 2000. of Teterboro, NJ formerly of Gouverneur, N.Y. Daughter of the late Edward J. and the late Jane (St. Louis). Friend of Ann and Edward McNierney and their children. Funeral from the TrinkaFaustini Funeral Home, 439 Maywood Ave, Maywood, NJ, Thursday, October 12. Mass at Immaculate Conception R.C. Church, Hackensack, 10AM. Entombment St. Joseph's Cemetery. Visiting Tuesday & Wednesday, 3-5 & 7-9.
